main event: A civilian observed a circular, flaming object approximately 45-50 feet in length that fell straight down and disappeared as if it turned itself off.
interesting points: The object moved in a straight downward trajectory before disappearing.
The object was observed for 1-5 minutes.
The sighting occurred on May 11, 1955 in Old Town, Maine.
The observation was made visually from the ground and in the air.
No photographs of the object were included in the report.
